typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{F1:MRData} as ({@limit} as short, {@offset} as boolean, {@series} as string, {@total} as short, {@url} as string, {F1:CircuitTable} as ({F1:Circuit} as ({@circuitId} as string, {@url} as string, {F1:CircuitName} as string, {F1:Location} as ({@lat} as double, {@long} as double, {F1:Country} as string, {F1:Locality} as string))[]))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'formula1',
	folderPath: 'RAW',
	fileName: 'circuits.xml',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true,
	namespacePrefixes: ['http://ergast.com/mrd/1.4'->'F1'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> XMLFromADLS2
XMLFromADLS2 foldDown(unroll({F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}),
	mapColumn(
		circuitRef = {F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}.{@circuitId},
		name = {F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}.{F1:CircuitName},
		location = {F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}.{F1:Location}.{F1:Locality},
		country = {F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}.{F1:Location}.{F1:Country},
		lat = {F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}.{F1:Location}.{@lat},
		lng = {F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}.{F1:Location}.{@long},
		url = {F1:MRData}.{F1:CircuitTable}.{F1:Circuit}.{@url}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCircuit
FlattenCircuit sort(asc(name, true),
	caseInsensitive: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortName
SortName sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'formula1',
	folderPath: 'RAW',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SaveAsCSV
